title: JALEN ROSE: NBA 'VERZUZ' MATCHMAKER
description:
Jalen & Jacoby decide it's finally NOT too early to talk about the MVP Race. They breakdown the top contenders, and talk about how the rest of the season MAY affect the final voting tally. Plus! More unfounded Aaron Rodgers speculation, a deep dive on the developing Zion Williamson situation, and ESPN's Sr. 'Verzuz' Matchmaker gives you HIS top NBA matchups... somebody call Swizz and Timbaland! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
